elements.text: You've recently been feeling overwhelmed with work, but you know that you need to get a second job to be in a more stable financial situation. While searching online for jobs, you saw an application for a job that sounds really fun for you. You think that working this second job will be...

elements.name: Extra Income_Finances_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
